name: Present Defence
description:
This game is a submission to extra credit's game jam on 2018

Don't let the pixelated look make it look easy! The game is carefully crafted and rebalanced.

What's cool about this game?

  • It is made in 3 days! (Not full 3 x 24 hours though)
  • You can find easter eggs!

Hint:

- Look for "EC" ( a reference to Extra Credits )

 - A 3 coloured roundish fun lay on the ground

Anyway have fun and never let the coals get your present!

Credits:

Gaminboi2864 (for the coal golem sprite)

Yru2kind (for entirely wonderful songs and sfx!)
